name: Mystic Blades
description:
In this project for Ludum Dare 51, we created a pixel art game with a top-down perspective. As you play, you must use the elemental resources around you to defeat the slimes that spawn every 10 seconds.

Your elemental energy also only lasts for 10 seconds, approach the orb to recharge.

Controls:

Move: WASD
Attack: Left-click Mouse
Pause: P

**Heads up:**

Yellow Orb: Wind

Orange Orb: Fire

Blue Orb: Water

Green Orb: Earth

Wind beats Water

Fire beats Earth

Water beats Fire

Earth beats Wind

Artist: Ian Victor
Programmer & Music: Bruno Zisman
